name: Ethan's Life Counter 2 - Multiplayer MTG
description:
A lightweight, high performing, sleek looking and volatile life counter that allows minor customization and doesn't heavily optimized to save your battery as much as possible!

Key Features:

-Select the amount of players you are using
-Select your starting life totals
-Buttons allow you to restart your current life total or go to the main menu.
-Simplistic design allows for easy customization

The life counter is perfect for Magic: The Gathering and any other game you need to track your life total. This app is perfect people who hate that other life counters drain their battery too quickly and force you to be hooked up to a phone charger.
